name: HulkShare.com - Minimal [PocketAppZ]
css: @namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml); @-moz-document domain("hulkshare.com") { body > div > div, body > div + div, DIV[style="text-align: center; width: 1080px;"], TABLE[style="width: 1080px;"] {width: auto !important;} DIV[style*="background-color: #ffeecf;"] {background: #000000 !important;} .tbl1 tr.hdr td, .tbl1 th, .hdr {background: none #174854 !important;} .tbl5 tr td, .tbl1 tr td {background: #333 !important;} .tbl5 tr:hover td {background: #555 !important;} table, table * {color: #DDD !important;} table a {color: #99FF99 !important;} table a * {color: inherit !important;} table a:hover {color: yellow !important;} DIV[style="text-align:center;width:300px;background-color:#fff0e1;border:1px solid #000000;height:250px;padding:4px;display:block;margin:0 auto"], DIV[style="text-align:center;width:728px;background-color:#fff0e1;border:1px solid #000000;height:90px;padding:4px;display:block;margin:0 auto"], DIV[align="right"][style="width: 312px; height: 262px; text-align: center; background-color: #fff0e1; border: 1px solid #000000;"], DIV[align="left"][style="width: 740px; height: 102px; background-color: #fff0e1; border: 1px solid #000000; padding-top:5px;"], A[href="http://hulkshare.com/premium.html"], A[target="_blank"][href*="http://www.facebook.com/"], A[target="_blank"][href*="http://twitter.com/"], [id*="google_ads"], .sinput, #sublist.premium_campaigns, #footer {display: none !important;} }
